title: Building Blockchain Smart-Contracts 101
slug: Learn how to build Smart-Contracts on the Blockchain.

files.title: Step 1: To Start, let us log into our Breweries
Step 2: Register a New Distributed Application (Instructor Demo Only)
Step 3.  Create a smart-contract to describe the business rules of the consortium
Step 4. Create barrels of beer by sending transactions to the smart contract
Step 5. Verify transactions have successfully been committed the blockchain
Step 6. Create a simple node.js application to interact with the blockchain
